                        <div class="course_desc">
                            <div class="course_desc_section">
                                <h1 class="course_title">Computer and Information Systems (Post-Baccalaureate Diploma)</h1>
                            </div>

                            <!-- Curriculum Notifications -->
                            
                            <div class="course_desc_section">
                                <span>Faculty:</span>
                                <span>Commerce & Business Administration</span>
                            </div>
                            
                            <div class="course_desc_section">
                                <span>Department:</span>
                                
                                    <span><a href="/programs-courses/faculties/commerce-business-administration/computing-studies-and-information-systems">Computing Studies & Information Systems</a></span>
                                
                            </div>
                            
                            <div class="course_desc_section">
                                <span>Credits:</span>
                                <span>60.0</span>
                            </div>

                                <span>Two years</span>
                            </div>

                                <span>Post-Baccalaureate Diploma</span>
                            </div>

                                <span>Admission Type:</span>
                                <span>Open Enrolment - Additional Admission Requirements</span>
                            </div>

                                <span>Full-time, Part-time</span>
                            </div>

                            <ul>

                            <!-- Overview -->
                            
                            <div id="overview" class="program-tab-content">
                                <span class="title">program overview</span>
                                
                                <div><p>Do you have a passion for apps and technology? Get started on your path to becoming a computer programmer, web technician, software engineer, information systems analyst, data administrator and more in this intensive, two-year program.</p>
<p>In your first year, you&rsquo;ll learn the basics of computing and programming, and will become familiar with current development tools. In your second year, you&rsquo;ll hone your technical skills through one of two specializations.</p>
<p><strong>Specializations</strong></p>
<ul>
    <li><strong></strong>Data Analytics &ndash; Learn business statistics and support systems, databases and data analysis in order to be prepared for such career opportunities as information systems analyst/consultant, computer and information systems manager and database analyst.</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li>Emerging Technology &ndash; Learn web scripting and programming, data algorithms, cloud infrastructure and mobile application development in order to be prepared for such career opportunities as computer and network operator, web technician, computer programmer, interactive media developer, software engineer, mobile software developer, and web designer and developer.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Excellent job prospects</strong></p>
<p>The IT industry is rapidly expanding, with about 7,000 technology companies in British Columbia and 182,000 job openings expected in Canada by 2019.</p>
<p><strong>Get work experience &ndash; before you graduate</strong></p>
<p>Put your skills and knowledge to work with a term with the <a href="/student-services/career-centre/co-op">Co-operative Education Program</a>.  You&rsquo;ll get hands-on work experience, College credit and be paid for your time.</p>

                            <!-- Curriculum Framework -->
                            
                            <div id="curriculum" class="program-tab-content">
                                <span class="title">curriculum framework</span>
                                <div><p><strong>Graduation Requirements</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Successful completion of 60 credits</li>
<li>70% (42 credits) of all coursework must be completed at Douglas College</li>
<li><span data-mce-mark="1">Must achieve a program GPA of 2.00 or higher in order to graduate</span></li>
</ul>
<p>This PBD-CIS program consists of twenty courses. Students take ten core courses in the first year, then take ten more courses in one of two streams:</p>
<ul>
<li>Emerging Technology</li>
<li>Data Analytics</li>
</ul>
